Name: Dumb Bomb Game
About the game: Use explosions to propel your character through levels, avoiding dangerous obstacles along the way. The greater your skill and the more efficient you are with the bombs, the higher your score! Features 40 levels of varying difficulty. Lots of dumb explosions. A level editor to create your own custom levels (or tweak the ones shipped with the game).
